bio.content: Various artists use the name Juan: 1. Juan is also one of many aliases taken on by Rubén Albarrán. A songwriter, instrumentalist, record producer and lead singer of four-time Grammy Award-winning Mexican band Café Tacvba. 2. Juan is a power metal vocalist, from Washington, he's been rocking hard since the late 90's, currently he is the vocalist in a project with a guitarist named Farlo, power metal is their prime objective. 3. Juan is a now defunct indie/punk band from Houston, TX most notable for one of their founding members, Composer/guitarist Shawn David McMillen. 4. Juan is a rapper from Detroit's 7 Mile Road on the eastside. He is a member of the Street Lord Chedda Boyz. Released two albums with the Street Lordz (Rollees Dont Tic Toc, Platinum Masterpieces), one solo mixtape (Worth the Weight) and has one solo album (The Real Me). 5. Juan Thomas Alvarez was born in the Dominican Republic in 1984 to parents Juan Thomas Carty and Milagro Alvarez Bustamante. At the young age of 3, he was given an opportunity to live and learn in Anguilla. There he developed his singing talent and appreciation for voice. At a young age Juan has been singing his heart out in his local home town, and neighboring islands.Through his teen years, he became more active in public events, and even attended his church's district competition locally and overseas. Now in his early 20s, Juan has found himself a manager, and is working on a demo. 6. Juan is a Model System singer from Osaka Prefecture. 7. Juan is a drummer from the alternative rock band Color for Shane. 8. Juan is a hard rock/metal/power metal singer that make songs covers and post the videos on Youtube. He has a voice in the style of Axl Rose. His youtube acount it's called "el hombre de los karaokes" or "karaoke man" in english. He has done covers of Guns 'n Roses, Tenacious D, AC/DC, Iron Maiden, among many others. You can found him here: http://www.youtube.com/user/elhombredeloskaraoke Read more on Last.fm.
